long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables users to quickly copy item and map codes from ratemyserver.net, one of the largest databases for Ragnarok Online. The items and maps are copied with their respective @alootid and @warp, allowing them to be directly used in the Ragnarok Online client.

With this extension, players can easily collect items for their quests. Ragnarok Online has been a highly popular online game since the early 2000s. Despite being released over a decade ago, this MMORPG still attracts a large number of players who enjoy playing it online. Since one of the game's main mechanics involves collecting items to complete quests and gain an advantage over other players, this extension provides an easy and quick way to copy item and map codes and use them directly in the game.

Legal Disclaimer:
This Chrome extension is not endorsed or certified by ratemyserver.net; it is simply an unofficial tool for enhancement and automation.
User privacy is important to us. We do not collect or store any user information.
